name: Just Another Day
description: Just Another Day is a PC, narrative exploration game that focuses on the themes ofdenial and acceptance. You play as a young Polish girl named Nadia on the advent of World War II. On a seemingly normal day, Nadia experiences a traumatic and tragic event that she is unable to cope with involving her family. Explore the house she lives in to find items that hold meaning from throughout Nadia's childhood to discover more about who she is as a person, and ultimately come to terms with the traumatic experience she has been running from.
